(Simplified: 颢)
Chinese Definition:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 景 [ jǐng ] scenery, view; conditions, circumstances
    • 頁 [ yè ] page, sheet, leaf
①白的樣子：顥顥。顥氣(潔白清新之氣)。
②古同“昊”，昊天。

顥字的基本解释

顥
hào
见“颢”。

顥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hào］
［《廣韻》胡老切，上晧，匣。］
“颢1”的繁体字。
(1)白色貌。
(2)大，盛。参见“顥然”。
(3)通“昊”。本指西天，泛指天空。

顥字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　顥； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1409第30
【唐韻】【正韻】胡老切【集韻】下老切【韻會】合老切，?音昊。【說文】白貌。【五音集韻】天邊氣。【楚辭·大招】天白顥顥。【註】顥顥，光貌。【班固·西都賦】鮮顥氣之淸英。【前漢·安世房中歌】西顥沆碭。【註】韋昭曰：西方少昊也。　【集韻】或作皓，亦作暠皜皞䯫。

Hao

Hao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hào］
["Guangyun" Hu Laoqie, Shang Hao, Xia. ]
Traditional characters for "Hao1".
(1) White appearance.
(2) Big and prosperous. See "Hao Ran".
(3) Through "Hao". This refers to the western sky, generally refers to the sky.
Hao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　 Hao; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1409 No. 30
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Hu Laoqie [Jiyun] Xia Laoqie [Yunhui] He Laoqie,? Yinhao. [Said the text] White appearance. 【Pentagram Rhyme】The sky is alive. [Songs of Chu·Great Move] Tianbai Haohao. [Note] Hao Hao, light appearance. 【Ban Gu·Xi Du Fu】Xian Hao Qi's Cheung Ying. [Former Han·An Shi Fangzhong Song] Xi Hao Hang Dang. [Note] Wei Zhao said: Western Shaohao also.　【Ji Yun】Or Zuo Hao, also Hao Hao Hao.
